author: kfogel
msg: After consultation with Mike, clarify a potential lifetime question:
(do_resources): Say why allocate parent in pool not subpool.

author: kfogel
msg: Clean up some doc and api bugs noticed while working on r7731:
(svn_fs_txn_root_name): Tell the truth about the pool.

author: kfogel
msg: * notes/releases.txt: wget does not take a '.' dest argument.

author: kfogel
msg: * notes/releases.txt: Just use the release number alone as the branch
name, so it's exactly the same as the upcoming tag name.  Remove
leftover bits from the days when the release manager built the
book by hand for each release.  Fix upload instructions.
